description: Optimize the Branin function defined as f(x1, x2) = a*(x2 - b*x1^2 + c*x1 - r)^2 + s*(1-t)*cos(x1) + s with fixed parameters.

objective.description: Minimize the value of the Branin function.

solution_representation: A list of two float numbers representing [x1, x2].
notes: The Branin function is a classical benchmark in continuous optimization with multiple local minima.
